notfound-page.title: Page Not Found
notfound-page.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved or doesn't exist.

footer.description: Professional photographer and videographer based in Sceaux, Hauts-de-Seine (92), available throughout France and internationally.

blog-footer.title: About me
blog-footer.description: My name is Jérémy and I'm a professional photographer and videographer based in Sceaux (92 - Hauts-de-Seine). For me, photography and videography are much more than a profession: they're a philosophy. It allows me to get closer to what really matters - human relationships, the bonds we build and the stories we live together.

carousel-hero.title: Madly.
carousel-hero.alt1: The bride and groom stand under an umbrella, surrounded by colored lights and confetti, creating a festive atmosphere during their first wedding dance. Captured by Jeremy Dan, a talented wedding photographer based in Sceaux, Hauts-de-Seine.
carousel-hero.alt2: A man carries a can in a chicken coop in work clothes. Photographed by Jeremy Dan, a corporate photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-hero.alt3: A mother holds her child in her arms. Both are happy and laughing together. Photographed by Jeremy Dan, a family photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-hero.alt4: Artist Nordine Ganso performs on stage in a colorful outfit. Photographed by Jeremy Dan, an event photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-hero.alt5: A couple walks hand in hand among the trees during their couple photo session covered by Jeremy Dan, a couple photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-hero.alt6: A woman speaks at the microphone with a bandana during the corporate evening covered by Jeremy Dan, a corporate photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-hero.alt7: The newlyweds kiss in a decorated town hall room filled with seated guests. As people applaud and some take photos, large paintings and chandeliers set the scene. Beautifully captured by Jeremy Dan, a talented wedding photographer based in Sceaux, this moment resonates with echoes of love.
carousel-hero.alt8: A couple sits facing a lake in a park. The woman rests her head on the man's shoulder and they gaze at the horizon. Photo taken during a couple photo session covered by Jeremy Dan, a couple photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-hero.alt9: A couple stands side by side in front of an old stone house with yellow shutters, surrounded by greenery and potted plants. Captured by Jeremy Dan, a wedding photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-hero.alt10: A group of people in traditional attire celebrating a wedding ceremony. Jeremy Dan, a wedding photographer based in Sceaux, captures the festive scene highlighted by strings of lights.

carousel-testimonials.title: Testimonials
carousel-testimonials.description1: Jeremy was able to capture all the important moments of this day. Thank you a thousand times for your guidance, advice, and patience on this special day.
carousel-testimonials.alt1: A couple in wedding attire stands holding hands in a chapel, facing an altar beneath stained glass windows, beautifully captured by Jeremy Dan, a wedding photographer based in Sceaux, Hauts-de-Seine.
carousel-testimonials.description2: His creative ideas and the grain of the photo editing added a magical touch. We highly recommend Jeremy's services to all future newlyweds looking for a talented and flexible photographer!
carousel-testimonials.alt2: During a charming ceremony in Paris, the bride and groom exchange rings. The bride holds a bouquet of white tulips, each moment expertly captured by Jeremy Dan, a renowned wedding photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-testimonials.description3: Pleasant, available and attentive to both the newlyweds and guests. Everyone was very happy with the work provided and how the day unfolded. To all future newlyweds, I warmly recommend Jeremy for his dynamism, serious work, but also for his kindness and good mood.
carousel-testimonials.alt3: Les mariés se tiennent debout devant les invités assis dans une salle d'hôtel de ville avec des lustres et des murs à motifs. Capturé par Jeremy Dan, un talentueux photographe de mariage basé à Sceaux, dans les Hauts-de-Seine, ce moment résume parfaitement l'élégance de la journée.
carousel-testimonials.description4: I can only recommend Jeremy for his discretion, punctuality, efficiency, talent but especially for his human side.
carousel-testimonials.alt4: During a traditional wedding ceremony, the bride and groom in traditional attire bow gracefully on the wooden floor. In the foreground, a third person holds a cup, expertly captured by Jeremy Dan, a talented wedding photographer based in Sceaux.
carousel-testimonials.description5: We hired Jeremy for our wedding following a recommendation from one of our friends and we weren't disappointed: professional and involved on the big day, he was also appreciated by all the guests.
carousel-testimonials.alt5: Un couple de mariés se promène sur un chemin, la mariée en robe blanche et le marié en costume rouge, entourés d'arbres et de murs en pierre. Capturé avec art par Jeremy Dan, photographe de mariage basé à Sceaux.
carousel-testimonials.description6: I had stumbled upon his work for another wedding and it was obvious: I had found the photographer for my event. Photos full of spontaneity, moments of happiness and joy immortalized.
carousel-testimonials.alt6: Capturé par Jeremy Dan, photographe de mariage basé à Sceaux, dans les Hauts-de-Seine, un couple de mariés en tenue de soirée se promène à l'intérieur parmi les invités assis. La mariée tient un bouquet et porte une étole de fourrure blanche et un voile, tandis que le père de la mariée porte un costume sombre.

photo-tiles.title: Capturing the Moment
photo-tiles.description: Every moment you live is a page in a greater story – your story. And every story deserves to be told with authenticity and sincerity. My role as a photographer is to capture the essence of these ephemeral moments in the photos I create to ensure they remain forever etched in your memories.
photo-tiles.alt1: A bride and groom share a kiss outside the church as guests surround them, blowing bubbles and snapping photos. Captured by Jeremy Dan, a talented wedding photographer based in Sceaux, Hauts-de-Seine, the joyful moment is preserved forever.
photo-tiles.alt2: Un couple de mariés dansant, le marié soulevant la mariée en robe blanche, est magnifiquement capturé par Jeremy Dan, photographe de mariage basé à Sceaux, sur un fond faiblement éclairé.
photo-tiles.alt3: A wedding couple, dressed in wedding attire, smiles at each other outdoors. The bride wears a lace dress and the groom a red suit. They stand holding hands, surrounded by greenery and a stone wall, as captured by Jeremy Dan, the wedding photographer based in Sceaux.
photo-tiles.alt4: Une mariée en robe blanche tient un bouquet, face à un groupe de femmes en plein air dans les Hauts-de-Seine, prêtes pour un lancer de bouquet. Capturé par Jeremy Dan, photographe de mariage basé à Sceaux.

wd.types: What types of wedding photography and videography do you offer?
wd.types-answer: I offer wedding photo or video reportage, depending on your preference.
wd.rates: What are your rates for wedding photography/video reportages?
wd.rates-answer: My rates start from €800 for a civil wedding, €1600 for a half-day, and €2500 for a full day. These rates may vary depending on the location, number of guests, and the duration of your wedding.
wd.defrayal: Are travel expenses included in your wedding photography/video rates?
wd.defrayal-answer: Travel expenses are included if your wedding is within 50 km of Sceaux (92 - Hauts-de-Seine). Beyond that, additional fees may apply (train/plane tickets or car travel).
wd.included-services: What services are included in your rates?
wd.included-services-answer: For a full day, my services include coverage of the preparations, ceremony, cocktail, party, group and couple photos. Post-production and adjustments are included, along with a private online gallery for accessing your images.
wd.additional-services: Do you offer additional services (albums, engagement sessions, after-day sessions)?
wd.additional-services-answer: Yes, in addition to the photo or video reportage, I offer high-end photo albums, engagement sessions before the wedding, and after-day sessions after the wedding to capture relaxed memories in a more informal setting.
wd.photos-number: How many photos will you deliver after the wedding?
wd.photos-number-answer: Every wedding is unique, and I prioritize quality over quantity. I don’t set a specific number, but you will receive a carefully curated selection of the best moments from your day.
wd.when-to-book: When should I book your services?
wd.when-to-book-answer: It is recommended to book at least one month in advance to ensure my availability, especially during the high wedding season.

ev.types: What types of events do you cover?
ev.types-answer: I provide photo and video reportage for various events, including concerts, festivals, bachelor parties, birthdays, and other festive moments. My approach is to capture the energy and unique atmosphere of each event.
ev.how: How do you work during a concert or festival?
ev.how-answer: I take an immersive approach to capture both the artists on stage and the atmosphere of the crowd. I adapt to lighting conditions and technical constraints to deliver dynamic and impactful images.
ev.bachelor-party: Do you offer photo/video reportage for bachelor parties and birthdays?
ev.bachelor-party-answer: Yes! Whether it’s a bachelor party, bachelorette party, or a birthday, I capture your memories with a fun and natural approach, far from stiff poses. My goal is to convey the emotion and atmosphere of your event.
ev.delivery-times: What are your delivery times for an event?
ev.delivery-times-answer: Delivery times depend on the type of event and the volume of photos/videos to process. Generally, you can expect 5 to 10 days for photos and 10 to 15 days for a video edit.

cp.types: What types of services do you offer for businesses?
cp.types-answer: I offer photo and video reportage for your professional events: seminars, corporate parties, conferences, product launches, and anything related to corporate events. I also create natural corporate portraits to showcase your teams. My goal is the same as with weddings: capturing images that breathe real life, far from forced poses and stiff smiles.
cp.delivery-times: What are the delivery times for your photos?
cp.delivery-times-answer: I commit to delivering your photos within 5 to 10 working days, depending on the project volume. For video, expect 10 to 15 days. Need an express turnaround? Let’s talk about it, I can adapt to your needs.
cp.behavior: How do you guarantee discretion during corporate events?
cp.behavior-answer: I prioritize a discreet and immersive approach to capture authentic moments without disrupting the flow of your event.
cp.itw: Do you conduct video interviews for businesses?
cp.itw-answer: Yes, I can conduct professional video interviews with quality lighting and sound for your communication needs.
cp.size: Do you offer packages tailored to startups or small businesses?
cp.size-answer: Yes, I can tailor my services based on your budget and specific needs.

ls.types: What types of lifestyle services do you offer?
ls.types-answer: I offer natural and authentic photo reportages. Whether it’s a family session, a couple shoot, or just a portrait, I create beautiful, spontaneous images full of emotion, far from stiff poses.
ls.where: Where do lifestyle photo sessions take place?
ls.where-answer: I conduct sessions outdoors, at your home, or at a location of your choice, depending on the desired ambiance.
ls.how: How does a lifestyle photo session unfold?
ls.how-answer: I guide you while allowing spontaneity to capture natural and sincere moments.
ls.clothes: What clothes do you recommend for a lifestyle photo session?
ls.clothes-answer: Simple outfits in neutral or pastel tones usually work very well for a harmonious look.

gn.payments: What payment methods do you accept?
gn.payments-answer: I accept all types of payments: bank transfer, credit card, PayPal, and even cryptocurrency (no, it's not a joke). Feel free to choose the method that works best for you!
gn.registered-answer: Yes, my business is fully registered. Here are my legal details: MONSIEUR JEREMY L'HOMME - SIREN: 822 048 575 - APE CODE: 7420Z - Photography Activities.
gn.book: How do I book a session or service?
gn.book-answer: Simply contact me via my website, email, or phone to schedule a meeting and discuss your project.
gn.steps: What are the steps after booking?
gn.steps-answer: Once the date is booked, we’ll discuss your expectations, then I’ll send you a contract, and a deposit will be required to confirm the booking.
gn.gift-cards: Do you offer gift cards for photo sessions?
gn.gift-cards-answer: Yes, you can gift a photo session to a loved one in the form of a voucher valid for one year.

sitemap-page.title: Sitemap
sitemap-page.description: Find all the pages of my site organized by category.

home-page.hero-description1: Capture the authenticity of every moment, reveal your most sincere emotions, and create timeless memories.
home-page.hero-description2: Photographer and videographer in Sceaux, Hauts-de-Seine (92), I immortalize your special moments in images, whether it's for a wedding, a corporate event, a business photoshoot, or a lifestyle session with family or couples.
home-page.hero-bullet1: – Natural and luminous images in photos and videos to tell your story with authenticity.
home-page.hero-bullet2: – Professional portraits, corporate reports, corporate videos, and brand content.
home-page.hero-bullet3: – Natural photos for couples, families, and individual portraits.
home-page.hero-bullet4: – Concerts, festivals, seminars... Capture the emotion and energy of your events.
home-page.hero-description3: Based in the Paris region, I travel throughout France and internationally.
home-page.subtitle: Authentic Photos and Videos for Real People.
home-page.description1: There is nothing more incredible than finding the person you cannot live without. Your true partner, the one who brightens your daily life. It is this unique connection that I want to immortalize.
home-page.description2: As a photographer and videographer, I use my vision to serve your stories, whether it's an emotional wedding, a professional portrait that reflects your image, a simple lifestyle session, or a vibrant event you want to remember forever. No matter the location – a spectacular setting or the intimacy of your daily life – my goal is to reveal your authenticity, your raw emotions, and everything that makes you, you.
home-page.description3: Don't hold back. Your story is unique. Let's create photos or videos that truly represent you.
home-page.photo-bullets-title: From start to finish of a report, I draw inspiration from every simple and poetic detail:
home-page.photo-bullet1: Natural, soft, and enveloping lights that enhance every emotion.
home-page.photo-bullet2: A style reminiscent of film, with warm, natural colors, and a touch of grain that gives your photos a timeless and cinematic texture.
home-page.photo-bullet3: Unposed moments, captured in the moment, that tell a truth that staged scenes cannot capture.
home-page.photo-description4: My work reflects my commitment to staying true to you, to what you feel, and to what binds you. I want every shot to be a mirror of your love, full of nuances and depth.
home-page.video-bullets-title: For me, filming is much more than capturing moving images. It's about telling a story, conveying an atmosphere, an emotion, a moment that resonates far beyond the present.
home-page.video-bullet1: I draw a lot of inspiration from cinema, with warm tones, subtle contrasts, and an organic texture.
home-page.video-bullet2: I don't seek to freeze poses, but to capture authenticity, the poetry of the moment as it is lived.
home-page.video-description4: Every film I create is designed as a living memory, faithful to you and your story. I want every movement, every sound, every emotion to instantly transport you back to that moment, as if you were there again.
home-page.description5: Memories are not just meant to be lived, but to be preserved and shared. Whether it's an intimate moment, a vibrant celebration, or a project close to your heart, my goal is to capture more than just a moment – I want to tell your story.
home-page.description6: It's not just about making images, but about creating a visual legacy, something that represents you, that you can pass on and cherish forever. Every photo, every video is designed to stand the test of time and awaken emotions, again and again.
home-page.description7: Ready to create something real together?

about-page.hero-title: I capture your story, the one which represents you.
about-page.alt: Photo of Jeremy Dan, wedding photographer based in Sceaux.
about-page.description1: Introducing oneself can be a delicate exercise, but it is so important when entrusting such an important moment to a photographer/videographer. Here is my little story!
about-page.description2: My name is Jeremy, I am 28 years old and I live in Sceaux in the Hauts-de-Seine (south of 92). A professional photographer and videographer for 5 years, I am fortunate to share my daily life with the one who gives rhythm and meaning to my life. I have three passions: photography, music, and skateboarding. Each of them nourishes my creativity and my vision of the world. When I'm not behind the lens capturing moments of life, I'm in front of my screen coding
about-page.description2-cont: . The site you are browsing was designed by me. French is my native language and I am fluent in English. In love with Sweden, I am also learning Swedish and hope to spend a few years exploring the beauty and serenity of the Scandinavian landscapes. I love stepping out of my comfort zone, discovering new perspectives, and learning from what the world has to offer. Each experience enriches my vision and, ultimately, my work as a photographer and videographer.
about-page.title2: My Vision of Photography and Video
about-page.description3: Photography and videography are more than just a job for me: they are a philosophy. They allow me to get closer to what really matters – human relationships, the bonds we build, and the stories we live. I firmly believe that we do not always pay enough attention to the fleeting moments of our lives. These precious, ephemeral fragments deserve to be captured with authenticity and sincerity. My goal is to provide you with beautiful, true, and moving images, whether it's a wedding, a corporate event, or a simple moment of life. I strive to capture every detail, every smile, every glance, without artifice, but with all the sensitivity that characterizes these unique moments.
about-page.description4: My goal is to capture these important moments with the sincerity that characterizes them. I want these images to be beautiful and true, no matter the occasion. In the end, that's what matters most to me.
about-page.bullet1-title: The Real, the Simple, the Spontaneous
about-page.bullet1: A discreet tear, a burst of laughter, a sincere hug.
about-page.bullet2: Those that tell your story and make it unique.
about-page.bullet3: Natural colors, the subtle grain of film combined with the contrasts of cinema.
about-page.bullet4: I want to capture your authenticity, not make you play a role.
about-page.bullet5: Your memories should stand the test of time, not go out of style in a few years.
about-page.bullet6: Generic photos lacking the emotion and context that make you unique.
about-page.description5: What motivates me is to offer you something tangible, a visual legacy that you can pass on. That you can relive these moments through true, touching, and sincere images – that's what drives me to give my best at every event.
about-page.description6: Let's create memories that will stand the test of time.

portfolio-page.description: A selection of some of my favorite photos from the weddings I have covered.

blog-page.description: Some love stories close to my heart that I want to share with you.

wedding-domaine-gillardiere.title: Wedding at Domaine de la Gillardière
wedding-domaine-gillardiere.excerpt: A beautiful wedding in the heart of Brie-Comte-Robert at Domaine de la Gillardière.
wedding-domaine-gillardiere.description: A hundred guests were present to celebrate Roxane and Tanguy's wedding. Emotional speeches, minimalist decoration, and an evening introduced by a majestic dance.

wedding-levallois-cityhall.title: Civil Wedding in Levallois-Perret
wedding-levallois-cityhall.excerpt: A wedding celebrated among family and close friends in the beautiful town hall of Levallois-Perret.
wedding-levallois-cityhall.description: Two humans I particularly love for their integrity and joy of life. We crown it all with lots of humor, DIY for all the decorations, and a good dose of simple but just right, for a moment that was simply genuine.

wedding-domaine-mylords.title: Wedding at Domaine des Mylords
wedding-domaine-mylords.excerpt: My first winter wedding celebrated in Tarascon near Nîmes.
wedding-domaine-mylords.description: What struck me most about this wedding was Emilie and Gaël's energy and kindness. They showed me that it can be very cold in the south, even with bright sunshine... Long life to you both!

editor.title: Website Editor
content: MONSIEUR JEREMY L'HOMME
Activity: Photographer and videographer (APE Code: 7420Z - Photography activities)
Email: bonjour@jeremydan.fr

publication.title: Publication Director
content: Publication Director: Jérémy L'homme

hosting.title: Hosting
content: This website is hosted by Hostinger International Ltd.
Dedicated VPS
61 Lordou Vironos Street
6023 Larnaca, Cyprus

intellectual-property.title: Intellectual Property
content: This entire website constitutes a work protected by intellectual property laws.

All photographs, texts, slogans, drawings, images, animated sequences whether with sound or not, as well as all other works integrated into the site are the property of Jérémy L'homme or third parties who have authorized Jérémy L'homme to use them.

Any reproduction, representation, use or modification, by any process whatsoever and on any medium whatsoever, of all or part of the site, without having obtained prior authorization from Jérémy L'homme, is strictly prohibited and constitutes an infringement.

personal-data.title: Personal Data Protection
content: Personal information collected on this site is intended for internal use only.

In accordance with the provisions of French Law No. 78-17 of January 6, 1978, relating to data processing, files, and freedoms, you have the right to access, modify, rectify, and delete data concerning you.
To exercise this right, please contact us by email at: bonjour@jeremydan.fr

services.title: Services Offered
content: Our services include photography and video coverage for:
- Weddings
- Corporate events
- Lifestyle sessions (family, couples)
- Various events

booking.title: Booking and Payment
content: A 30% deposit of the total amount is required to secure the booking.
The balance must be paid no later than the day of the service.
Prices are in euros and are not subject to VAT (article 293B of the French General Tax Code).

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
content: You have a 14-day cooling-off period from the date of signing the quote.
If you cancel within this period, the deposit will be fully refunded.
After this period, the deposit will be retained.
Any cancellation request must be made by registered letter with acknowledgment of receipt.

delivery.title: Delivery Terms
content: Photos and videos are delivered within 4-6 weeks.
Delivery is made via a secure online gallery (Pictime).
Digital files are kept for 12 months for original files and 3 years for processed files.

intellectual-property.title: Copyright and Intellectual Property
content: The photographer retains copyright ownership of all photos and videos produced.
Clients receive a right of use for their personal and family use.
Any commercial or professional use must be subject to prior written agreement.

collected-data.title: Data Collection
content: We only collect necessary data through our contact form:
- First and last name
- Email address
- Phone number
- Message

analytics.title: Traffic Analysis
content: We use Umami, a privacy-friendly analytics tool.
Umami does not collect any personal data and does not place any cookies on your device.
The collected data is anonymous and is only used to understand overall site usage.

data-usage.title: Data Usage
content: Contact form data is used solely to respond to your inquiries.
We never share your data with third parties.
No data is used for commercial or advertising purposes.

rights.title: Your Rights
content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
- Right to access your data
- Right to rectification
- Right to erasure
- Right to restrict processing
To exercise these rights, contact us at: bonjour@jeremydan.fr

website-usage.title: Website Usage
content: This is a showcase website presenting Jérémy L'homme's photography and video services.
The use of the website is free and does not require any registration.
Users agree not to disrupt the proper functioning of the website.

content.title: Website Content
content: All website content (texts, images, videos) is protected by copyright.
Any reproduction or use without prior authorization is prohibited.
The images presented are the exclusive property of Jérémy L'homme.

liability.title: Liability
content: We strive to keep the website accessible at all times but cannot guarantee continuous availability.
We decline any responsibility in case of inability to access the website or technical difficulties.
Links to external websites are provided for information only and we are not responsible for their content.

contact-page.hero-title: Let's Get to Know Each Other

wedding.desc: I look forward to discussing your project and the wonderful opportunities we can explore together. Whether it's for a wedding, an event, a corporate report, or a lifestyle session, it's essential for me to learn more about you and your expectations. Once the form is filled out, I will propose a meeting over coffee or via Google Meet for those with busy schedules!
wedding.desc2: My rates are provided only by appointment. You can also email me directly at
wedding.title: Wedding
wedding.message-placeholder: From the colors of your universe to the key moments you want to capture, I want to know it all! Share your ideas, desires, and even those little details that will make your project unique. The more I know, the better I can capture images that truly represent you.
wedding.knowing_source-label: How Did You Hear About Me?
wedding.knowing_source-desc: This helps a lot for the development of my business!

photography-sceaux.introduction: I authentically capture the moments that matter to you, whether it's a wedding, an event, a corporate report, or a lifestyle session with your partner or family.
photography-sceaux.introduction2: Based in Hauts-de-Seine, I accompany you in Sceaux and throughout France and internationally to immortalize your precious moments.
photography-sceaux.content1: Each project is a unique story, and my role is to tell it through sincere and authentic images, without artifice or staged poses. Whether it's a wedding, an event, a corporate report, or a lifestyle session, my approach is based on spontaneity and emotion.
photography-sceaux.content2: I blend into the background to capture each moment without disrupting your day. You enjoy fully, and I capture the looks, gestures, energy, and genuine moments. Of course, we will also take the time to create portraits and more posed images, but always with naturalness and fluidity.
photography-sceaux.content3: My approach is that of a reportage: observe, feel, and capture the essence of each moment. From laughter to complicit exchanges, my goal is to accurately and sensitively convey what makes your story unique.
photography-sceaux.alt1: Back photo of Jeremy Dan, professional photographer in Sceaux.
photography-sceaux.content4: I draw inspiration from film photography to offer images with a timeless aesthetic:
photography-sceaux.bullet1-content: , true to the moment as it was lived.
photography-sceaux.bullet2-content: , providing an organic and authentic texture.
photography-sceaux.alt2: A woman plays with her dog during a wedding ceremony.
photography-sceaux.content5: My goal is not just to capture a moment, but to tell a story, seize an emotion, and create images that will stand the test of time.
photography-sceaux.content6: My services adapt to your needs and the story you wish to tell. The rates indicated below are for reference and may vary depending on your specific expectations. Travel expenses are included within a 50 km radius around Sceaux (92 - Hauts-de-Seine). Beyond that, additional travel costs will be requested (train/plane tickets or car travel). These rates do not include potential food and accommodation expenses. Feel free to
photography-sceaux.alt3: A man and a woman sit against a barrier waiting for a corporate evening covered by Jeremy Dan, corporate photographer.
photography-sceaux.alt4: A bride and groom in wedding attire happily exit the town hall during their civil wedding.
photography-sceaux.alt5: The bride and groom hug while dancing during their couple's photoshoot covered by Jeremy Dan, wedding photographer.
photography-sceaux.bullet7-content: – starting at 150€ per person (discounted rate for multiple employees)
photography-sceaux.bullet8-content: – starting at 600€ for a half-day / 1200€ for a full day
photography-sceaux.bullet9-content: – starting at 800€ for a half-day / 1500€ for a full day

slider.slider-image-1: The bride and groom dance together in their wedding attire during the ceremony.
slider.slider-image-2: The bride and groom exit the town hall in their wedding attire, cheered on by the guests.

wedding-photography.introduction: Capture your special moments with a mix of spontaneous emotions and artistic composition. From intimate ceremonies to grand celebrations, I ensure every detail is preserved.
wedding-photography.content2: Your wedding is a unique story. My role is to tell it with authentic and genuine images, without artifice or staged poses. Just you, as you are, in the intensity of the moment.
wedding-photography.content3: I blend into the background to capture each moment without disrupting the flow of the day. You enjoy fully, and I capture the emotions, the glances, the spontaneous gestures. Of course, we will take the time to do couple and group photos, but without rigid staging – just real moments, captured naturally.
wedding-photography.content4: My approach is that of reportage: capturing spontaneity, energy, and the sensitivity of each moment. From laughter to complicit silences, I strive to faithfully convey the essence of your day without interfering.
wedding-photography.alt1: The bride and groom walk hand in hand through a small village, looking at each other in a warm and bohemian atmosphere.
wedding-photography.content5: I draw a lot of inspiration from film photography to give my images a timeless look:
wedding-photography.bullet2-b: A slight grain and subtle contrasts
wedding-photography.alt2: A guest photographed from behind by Jeremy Dan during the reception of a civil wedding.
wedding-photography.content6: The goal is not just to document a day, but to create images that tell a story, capture an emotion, and stand the test of time.
wedding-photography.content7: You can reach me by phone, via the form on my
wedding-photography.content7-c: . The more details you provide about your wishes and your wedding, the better I can offer you an optimized and tailored quote.
wedding-photography.content8: We schedule a video call or a coffee to discuss your wedding, your expectations, and the desired atmosphere. It's also an opportunity to get to know each other and see if we click naturally.
wedding-photography.content9: Following our discussion, I will send you a detailed quote tailored to your project.
wedding-photography.content10: If the quote suits you, I will send you the contract. Once signed, your date is officially reserved, and the adventure begins!
wedding-photography.content11: For each wedding booking (excluding civil weddings), I offer a couple's photoshoot (engagement session). A privileged moment before the big day, ideal for creating memories in a relaxed atmosphere and getting comfortable in front of the camera.
wedding-photography.content12: My services adapt to your wishes and needs. The rates indicated below are for reference and may vary depending on your specific expectations. Travel expenses are included within a 50 km radius around Sceaux (92 - Hauts-de-Seine). Beyond that, additional travel costs will be requested (train/plane tickets or car travel). These rates do not include food and accommodation expenses. Feel free to
wedding-photography.alt3: A couple sits on a bench, looking at each other and laughing in a park.
wedding-photography.alt4: A couple photographed from behind by Jeremy Dan walks hand in hand, looking at the horizon in a park.
wedding-photography.alt5: The bride and groom gaze tenderly at each other in front of the Château de Sceaux entrance.
wedding-photography.alt6: The bride and groom lovingly toast each other in a beautiful house with a glass door.
wedding-photography.bullet16: Complete wedding coverage: preparations, ceremony, cocktail, evening
wedding-photography.alt7: The bride and groom admire their wedding cake during the evening reception at a venue.
wedding-photography.title6: Why Choose Me as Your Wedding Photographer
wedding-photography.content14: No staged poses or forced smiles. My approach favors genuine moments, captured spontaneously. Each image faithfully tells the emotion of your day.
wedding-photography.content15: Inspired by film photography, I work with soft colors, natural light, and a slight grain for a warm and timeless look. Memories that retain their intensity over the years.
wedding-photography.content16: I capture each moment without disrupting the flow of your day. Present but discreet, I seize the energy and emotion of each instant. You enjoy fully, without worrying about the camera.
wedding-photography.content17: From the first exchange to the delivery of the photos, everything is designed for a serene experience. I accompany you throughout the organization from our first exchange to the delivery of the photos.
wedding-photography.content18: Each wedding is unique. My approach adapts to your story to create images that reflect you and that you will enjoy reliving over and over again.
wedding-photography.alt8: A string of lights with a pronounced background blur photographed by Jeremy Dan during a wedding ceremony.

corporate-photography.introduction: Capture the essence of your business with the right balance of spontaneity and careful composition. Events, portraits, reports… each image reflects your identity with precision and authenticity.
corporate-photography.content2: Your business is unique, and my role is to capture that uniqueness through authentic and natural images. I highlight you, your team, and your expertise with precision and accuracy.
corporate-photography.content3: I blend into your environment to document each moment without disrupting your activities. You stay focused on your work, and I capture the interactions, gestures, and energy that drive you. Of course, we will also take the time to create portraits and group photos, but always with authenticity and reality.
corporate-photography.content4: My approach is that of reportage: capturing the dynamics, the human element, and the essence of your business. From strategic exchanges to moments of collaboration, I strive to faithfully convey your universe with impact.
corporate-photography.alt1: A woman is photographed from the side by Jeremy Dan during a corporate evening, with a play of light on the top of her head.
corporate-photography.content5: I draw inspiration from the codes of film photography to offer timeless and authentic images:
corporate-photography.bullet2-b: A slight grain and subtle contrasts
corporate-photography.alt2: Two farmers working on their farm. Photo taken by Jeremy Dan, professional corporate photographer.
corporate-photography.content6: My goal: capture the moment with authenticity, highlighting each detail with precision.
corporate-photography.content7: You can reach me by phone, via the form on my
corporate-photography.content7-c: . The more details you provide about your project, the better I can offer you a tailored service.
corporate-photography.content8: We plan a video call or a coffee to discuss your expectations, the image you want to convey, and the visual universe to adopt. It's also an opportunity for us to get to know each other and ensure that my approach meets your needs.
corporate-photography.content9: Following our discussion, I will send you a detailed quote tailored to your requests and constraints.
corporate-photography.content10: If the quote suits you, I will send you the contract. Once signed, your project is officially launched!
corporate-photography.content12: Each business has specific image needs. Whether for professional portraits, an immersive report, or event coverage, my services adapt to your activity. The rates below are for reference and may vary depending on your project and the use of the images. Travel expenses are included within a 50 km radius around Sceaux (92 - Hauts-de-Seine). Beyond that, additional travel costs will be requested (train/plane tickets or car travel). These rates do not include food and accommodation expenses (if your event takes place in the evening or over several days). Feel free to
corporate-photography.alt3: A young woman is photographed face-on by Jeremy Dan during a professional photoshoot for her small business.
corporate-photography.alt4: A young woman is photographed in a yoga pose by Jeremy Dan during a professional photoshoot for her small business.
corporate-photography.subtitle6: Team and Individual Portraits – starting at 150€ per person (discounted rate for multiple employees)
corporate-photography.bullet4: Carefully crafted and natural photos to showcase your employees on your website and professional networks.
corporate-photography.alt5: An osteopath is photographed from the side by Jeremy Dan while working on his computer in his office.
corporate-photography.subtitle7: Corporate Reportage – starting at 600€ for a half-day / 1200€ for a full day
corporate-photography.bullet10: An immersion in your activity to capture the work atmosphere, your premises, and your expertise.
corporate-photography.alt6: A young woman in a sparkling dress is photographed by Jeremy Dan during a corporate seminar.
corporate-photography.subtitle8: Event Coverage – starting at 800€ for a half-day / 1500€ for a full day
corporate-photography.bullet16: Seminars, conferences, product launches… Images that reflect the energy and highlights of your events.
corporate-photography.subtitle9: Regular Photo Content Production – starting at 2000€ per month
corporate-photography.bullet17: For businesses with recurring image needs, I offer regular photo content production tailored to your communication and visual identity.
corporate-photography.alt7: A man in a blue suit sitting on a chair is photographed by Jeremy Dan during a corporate seminar.
corporate-photography.title6: Why Choose Me as Your Corporate Photographer
corporate-photography.content14: I capture the essence of your business through authentic and natural images. No staged poses or forced smiles. My approach favors real moments, captured spontaneously, to faithfully convey the energy of your team and work environment.
corporate-photography.content15: Inspired by film photography, I work with soft colors, natural light, and a slight grain for an elegant and timeless look. Stand out from generic images with photos that truly reflect your identity.
corporate-photography.content16: I integrate discreetly into your daily routine to capture each moment without disrupting the natural flow of your activities. Present but discreet, I seize the authenticity of each instant, allowing you to stay focused on your priorities.
corporate-photography.content17: From the first exchange to the delivery of the photos, everything is designed for a simple and serene experience. I accompany you at every step, from planning to finalization, to ensure results that perfectly reflect your business identity.
corporate-photography.content18: My approach adapts to your culture and needs to create images that reflect you and that you will enjoy sharing and reliving over and over again.
corporate-photography.alt8: Two photographers are photographed by Jeremy Dan during a corporate evening.
corporate-photography.alt9: A young man model showcases his denim overshirt in front of a wall decorated with a large graffiti during a professional photoshoot by Jeremy Dan.
corporate-photography.alt10: A man sticks out his tongue while looking up, surrounded by his colleagues during the dance party at his company's seminar.
